CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Job Posting Viewed stage positioned above or below the Phone Screen stage?
SRP.A: The Job Posting Viewed stage is positioned {above} the Phone Screen stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Offer Extended?
VE.A: The value of stage Offer Extended is {24%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Application Submitted?
VE.A: The value of stage Application Submitted is {84%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Technical Interview?
VE.A: The value of stage Technical Interview is {37%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Job Posting Viewed, with a value of {100%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Offer Extended, with a value of {24%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Application Submitted to stage Phone Screen?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Application Submitted to stage Phone Screen is {15%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage HR Interview to stage Technical Interview?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage HR Interview to stage Technical Interview is {17%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Technical Interview to stage Offer Extended?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Technical Interview to stage Offer Extended is {13%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 61%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Job Posting Viewed} stage has {100%}, the {Application Submitted} stage has {84%}, the {Phone Screen} stage has {69%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 61%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {HR Interview} stage has {54%}, the {Technical Interview} stage has {37%}, the {Offer Extended} stage has {24%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 30% and 76%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Phone Screen} stage has {69%}, the {HR Interview} stage has {54%}, the {Technical Interview} stage has {37%}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Application Submitted to Phone Screen, or from stage Phone Screen to HR Interview?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Application Submitted} to {Phone Screen} is equal to the reduction from stage Phone Screen to HR Interview.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage HR Interview to Technical Interview, or from stage Job Posting Viewed to Application Submitted?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {HR Interview} to {Technical Interview} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Phone Screen to HR Interview, from stage HR Interview to Technical Interview, or from stage Application Submitted to Phone Screen?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {HR Interview} to stage {Technical Interview} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {HR Interview} and {Technical Interview} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Technical Interview} and {Offer Extended} stages.
